track_notes: This is the road version of the hike, there is also a trail from the campground nearby that leads up to the peak but it was closed when I was there due to the Frye Fire.  The road is closed to vehicles, well maintained dirt road and an easy 2+ mi hike all the way to the top.
This is the same as the up track, down version.

There was substantial fire damage to the trail in 2017 and parts of it are challenging to find through the undergrowth.  But this track is the full trail from the Shannon Campground.  You can combine it with the Road track posted here to make a loop, or do and out-and-back
This is the down version, same trail.
track_title: Heliograph Peak via Arcadia Trail - Down

track_notes: From US 191 and AZ 366 (the Swift Trail), turn southwest onto AZ 366 past the prison and drive 22 miles up the mountain to the entrance of Shannon Campground and the road to Heliograph Peak Lookout. Park at GPS coordinates 32.6563,-109.8602 and hike up the road about 2.2 miles to the summit, with 1,120 feet of gross elevation gain and an average slope of 16 degrees. There are trees as well as open spaces to erect antennas at the summit.
track_title: Heliograph Peak Hike Round Trip via Road to Summit
